title: Egg & Onion Masala
instructions: Beat eggs. Fry sliced onions with garlic and spices. Add beaten eggs and scramble till cooked. Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Onion Omelette
instructions: Chop onions. Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Fry onions then add egg mix and cook both sides.

title: Paneer Bhurji
instructions: Crumble paneer. Saute onion and tomato, add spices and paneer. Cook 2-3 mins. Serve with roti.

title: Potato Fry
instructions: Slice potatoes & onions. Fry till crisp, season and serve.

title: Scrambled Eggs with Tomato
instructions: Saute tomato & onion in butter. Add beaten eggs and scramble. Serve warm.

title: Simple Fried Egg
instructions: Heat oil, crack egg, cook till set. Season and serve.
